Messages.Author: Jan Kratzer
Messages.Content: The one-pager should be handed until 23rd of June (deadline)! During the offline session at 24th of June and the online session at 1st of July only the one-pagers that are handed latest 23rd of June will be discussed. In addition, some time of both sessions will be spent on focussing on the core-parts of the essay “methodology/epistemology/ontology”. For handing in the one-pager the following points are important: Ontology – Scientific, Societal, Practical relance of research theme and question Epistemology – Deductive or Inductive approach, theoretical background, hypotheses Methodology – Qualitative/Quantitative/Mixed methods, data sources

Messages.Author: Jan Kratzer
Messages.Content: The next week session from 2:00 pm at 10th of June will be online: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/9962298842?pwd=OG1qNjFaVUcrMWFhTVpnM3o0a1hoQT09

Messages.Author: Jan Kratzer
Messages.Content: Due to the low interest in the offline format at Monday`s I will offer to summarize all inspirational themes in the next to session in order to prepare you to hand in a one pager latest 23rd for discussing your essay. Thus, there will be a summarizing session at 2:00 pm, 3rd of June and 10th of June.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Offline lecture tomorrow at 13th of May

Messages.Author: Jan Kratzer
Messages.Content: Offline lecture tomorrow at 13th of May

Messages.Author: Ira Martina Rosenberg
Messages.Content: Dear Students, I'm sorry that today's lecture must also be postponed.  Please watch the lecture video and self-study the supplementary material. Please take notes about your questions, which can be discussed in a following session. It is not necessary to send these questions as emails to Prof. Kratzer, but just hold on to them for the next session or collect them as posts in the forum. Hope you have a nice day and stay healthy! Best Regards, Ira Rosenberg
